scripts.theme:dev: npm run generate-theme-env -- --dev && npm run generate-vite-server && npm run img:gen:dev && concurrently "npm:img:watch" "npm:lint:watch" "npm:wp:start:dev" "npm:serve"
scripts.theme:build: npm run generate-theme-env -- --prod && npm run img:gen:prod && vite build
scripts.build: npm run theme:build && npm run plugin:build
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run wp:start:prod
scripts.wordmove:push:all: cross-env THEME_SOURCE=dist docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove push -e production --all
scripts.wordmove:push:theme: cross-env THEME_SOURCE=dist docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove push -e production -t
scripts.wordmove:push:db: cross-env THEME_SOURCE=dist docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove push -e production -d
scripts.wordmove:push:uploads: docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove push -e production -u
scripts.wordmove:push:plugins: docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove push -e production -p
scripts.wordmove:pull:theme: cross-env THEME_SOURCE=dist docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove pull -e production -t
scripts.wordmove:pull:db: docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove pull -e production -d
scripts.wordmove:pull:uploads: docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove pull -e production -u
scripts.wordmove:pull:plugins: docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove pull -e production -p
scripts.wordmove:pull:all: cross-env THEME_SOURCE=dist docker-compose run --rm wordmove wordmove pull -e production --all
